name: Drop Cats
description:
Test your cat dropping skills in this fast-paced game for all ages!

You control the Drop Cats, a group of city-dwelling felines who are concerned with the epidemic of smartphone addiction among humans. In order to help the humans break their bad habits, you must drop onto their heads and free them of their phones (and coins).

Complete all three buildings and brag to your friends. Just don't forget to occasionally look up from your phone - you never know when a Drop Cat might fall from above!
